text: Michelangelo Antonioni (, ; 29 September 1912 â€“ 30 July 2007) was an Italian film director, screenwriter, editor, and painter. His best known movie is Blowup, made in 1966. He died on the same day as Ingmar Bergman, another famous director. He was born in Ferrara and died in Rome. == References == == Other websites == * Category:Italian movie directors Category:Italian screenwriters Category:People from Ferrara Category:1912 births Category:2007 deaths
title: Michelangelo Antonioni
